resources.string:
Illumina is a biotechnology company that produces the instruments and reagents used to analyze genetic information. Illumina's mission is to unlock the power of the genome (the genetic information stored inside all living things). 

Companies like 23 and Me use Illumina technology for their genetic testing. 

With offices around the world and employees dedicated to providing unparalleled accuracy in determining genetic information, Illumina has become the standard for genetic sequencing and array technologies.
